title: Patch Notes 1.0.1
author: Development Team
text:
Version 1.0.1 brings exciting updates to the game:

- Features:
  1. Added new map layout for enhanced gameplay experience.

- Fixes:
  1. Resolved an issue where players could not join multiplayer lobbies.

- Updates:
  1. Improved AI behavior for better challenge in single-player mode.

title: Patch Notes 1.0.0
author: Development Team
text:
Version 1.0.0 marks the initial release of the game:

- Release:
  1. Initial release of the game with core features and multiplayer support.
